      • initalize

        public thirdparty.fsu.random.QMCHaltonAdvanced initalize(int nDimension)
        initialize an instance of the qmc and return it. To use it: initialize a double array of size nPoints and feed it to the halton instance as many times as needed for new points. double[] output = new double[nDimension]; qmcA.halton(output);
        Parameters:
        nDimension - the number of points to generate for each iteration.
        Returns:
